00030 #import <UIKit/UIKit.h>
00031 
00032 // If you are using the framework
00033 #import <GHUnitIOS/GHUnitIOS.h>
00034 // If you are using the static library and importing header files manually
00035 //#import "GHUnitIOS.h"
00036 
00037 // Default exception handler
00038 
00039 void exceptionHandler(NSException *exception) {
00040         NSLog(@"%@\n%@", [exception reason], GHUStackTraceFromException(exception));
00041 }
00042 
00043 int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
00044         
00045         /*!
00046          For debugging:
00047          Go into the "Get Info" contextual menu of your (test) executable (inside the "Executables" group in the left panel of XCode).
00048          Then go in the "Arguments" tab. You can add the following environment variables:
00049          Default: Set to:
00050          NSDebugEnabled NO "YES"
00051          NSZombieEnabled NO "YES"
00052          NSDeallocateZombies NO "YES"
00053          NSHangOnUncaughtException NO "YES"
00054          NSEnableAutoreleasePool YES "NO"
00055          NSAutoreleaseFreedObjectCheckEnabled NO "YES"
00056          NSAutoreleaseHighWaterMark 0 non-negative integer
00057          NSAutoreleaseHighWaterResolution 0 non-negative integer
00058          For info on these varaiables see NSDebug.h; http://theshadow.uw.hu/iPhoneSDKdoc/Foundation.framework/NSDebug.h.html
00059          For malloc debugging see: http://developer.apple.com/mac/library/documentation/Performance/Conceptual/ManagingMemory/Articles/MallocDebug.html
00060          */
00061         
00062         NSSetUncaughtExceptionHandler(&exceptionHandler);
00063         
00064         NSAutoreleasePool *pool = [[NSAutoreleasePool alloc] init];
00065         
00066         // Register any special test case classes
00067         //[[GHTesting sharedInstance] registerClassName:@"GHSpecialTestCase"];
00068         
00069         int retVal = 0;
00070         // If GHUNIT_CLI is set we are using the command line interface and run the tests
00071         // Otherwise load the GUI app
00072         if (getenv("GHUNIT_CLI")) {
00073                 retVal = [GHTestRunner run];
00074         } else {
00075                 retVal = UIApplicationMain(argc, argv, nil, @"GHUnitIPhoneAppDelegate");
00076         }
00077         [pool release];
00078         return retVal;
00079 }
